TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Hassan_Rouhani, title = Hassan_Rouhani, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hassan_Rouhani} }

S.FORM: = Hassan Rouhani = Mntucing hngkawas 1992 idas 8 jiyax 1 ka Hassan Rouhani ga, empklaw ka hiya. Bukung klwaan Iran ta sayang o kiya ka Hassan Rouhani, pnaah hngkawas 2013 idas 8 jiyax 4 pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. = Hassan Rouhani = Hassan Rouhani (kari Persia: حسن روحانی‎‎, kngkawas 1948 idas 11 diyax 12－), Iran seyji cya, waycyaw cya, mnngalan Iran sosi tanpan dayhyo. Pusu kari srngaw dha ka kari Persia. Mniq kngkawas 2013 idas 6 diyax 14 na kngkawas 2013 kcka seyngkyo Soto cida mbiyax mangal Soto Iran, idas 8 diyax 3 ka psdhuwan phiyu Soto. Kngkawas 2017 idas 5 diyax 20 wada mndungus lmutuc mangal Soto dungan. Kndusan Kngkawas 1948 idas 11 cida Hassan Rouhani u mntuting Semnan Sng Sorkheh Su, mnniq Semnan Singgakuying mi Qum Singgakuying muyas smluhay waya Islam, kiya ka brah tunux bukung Khomeni na mdhu bay mpsnul niya, msmpusal wada sqraq sapah kung. Kngkawas 1980 dhuq kngkawas 2000 ngalan gying Islam Gikay. Tubrah niya seyji Kngkawas 1989 dhuq kngkawas 2005, Hassan Rouhani u ngalan Knbaraw Balay Qnlhangan Anjeyng Yingkay Misu, kngkawas 2000 prading ngalan Iran Seymung Kaygi cngweyn. Kngkawas 2003 dhuq kngkawas 2005 mniq Khatami ngalan Soto iyax cida, Hassan Rouhani ka ngalan Iran sosi tanpan dayhyo, tuhuy Ingkoku, France mi Doicu snquri psangay Yo Nongswo wada smhdu kari. Soto Kngkawas 2013 idas 4 diyax 11 cida, Hassan Rouhani pa pkla kari tumal seyngkyo Soto. Brah ini uuda seyngkyo knbeyhing han pa Knpriyux Pay taxa bay hosweynjn Afurey u wada kasi alix mpseyngkyo, Hassan Rouhani u wada mspriyux meytaq Knpriyux Paya, hiya u wada mangal dnkuhan Hatami mi Rahusangcyani. Mniq kcka 6 Soto hosweynjn u niqan 5 hiyi ka mkray pawso pay, Hassan Rouhani Dmudul mndungus seyji mi keyjay cngce, tuhuy txtaxa u ppwaluk knmalu pnluban kana. Wada rmngaw ka hiya psli phiyu kingal 'Htngayan Knkla mi Sntangan' na seyhu, tuhuy qnlangan syakay phiyu mdhu bay pnluban, so ini dayi pcahu mi mlih ka ka ndanan pcahu. Kngkawas 2013 idas 6 diyax 15, Iran Neycngpu pjla ndanan seyngkyo, knkana hyo seyngkyo u 36,704,156, wada mbiyax mangal 18,613,329 hyo ka Hassan Rouhani, wada dmka dnkuhan mi mndungus mangal burah sndhuwan Soto, ana ini uda mntu2 seyngkyo, kiya mi pusu balay pnsung hiya ka Mohammad Bagher Ghalibaf pa wana balay 6,077,292 hyo ka mnangal niya. Idas 8 diyax 3 cida, Iran tubaraw bukung Khamenei mdhu bay pkla kari hniwan niya Soto ka Hassan Rouhani, Hassan Rouhani u mniq idas 8 diyax 4 mniq Gikay psdhuwan phiyu, balay bay mdhu phyuwan tu11 Soto Iran. Idas 9 diyax 27, Hassan Rouhani u tuhuy Amirika Soto Barac Obama muda mn1 pprngaw qnawal, niyi ka Soto Amirika mi Iran snpeyyah pstuq pnluban mntxan balay mpprngaw, pprngawan dha kari u rnrnu quri uuda ho uri. Kngkawas 2017 idas 4 diyax 14, Hassan Rouhani pkla kari mntxan tumal Soto seyngkyo dungan, mkmangal mntxan dungan. Idas 5 diyax 20, Iran Neycngpu ka muda pkla ndan seyngkyo, knkana hyo seyngkyo pa ya bay 40,000,000 hyo, Hassan Rouhani u wada mangal ya bay 23,000,000 hyo, wada mangal hmrinas dmka dnkuhan mi mndungus mbiyax mangal burah bnkuwan Soto dungan, ana ini mntu2 meytaq hyo. Kngkawas 2019 idas 12 diyax 17, Hassan Rouhani u musa Malaysia tumal Kngkawas 2019 Kuala Lumpur Dudux Kay, tuhuy Malaysia Sosyang Tun Dr Mahathir bin Mohamad mniq Bangunan Perdana Putra Building mtqita dqras. Ddha dha u ya bay mnuda pprngaw kari 45 pungkang. Kngkawas 2020 idas 7 diyax 18, Hassan Rouhani mniq sotu Tehran na neyge kaygi rmngaw, snpeyyah prru Narux Punu Brah Cyokoku Uhan (Narux COVID-19) pspuruq dhuq saya, spuwan u ya bay dhuq 2500 knbkiyan hiyi sediq Iran ka wada run narux niyi, so muda snbeyhing mita knbeyhing bay narux preuru Narux Punu Brah Cyokoku Uhan (Narux COVID-19) niyi. Hassan Rouhani u dmuwi Iran Weysngpu na burah keyngkyo, rmngaw mniq mkpiya idas niyi pa, ya bay musa 30 knbkiyan dhuq 3500 knbkiyan hiyi sediq ka muda prru Narux Punu Brah Cyokoku Uhan (Narux COVID-19) niyi, ya bay knhbrawan hiyi musa mniq byoying u 'Nmk2 knhbrawan hiyi mnuda 150 diyax brah niya'. Seyhu Tehran uri u wada pkla burah pnwaya kmtur u muda 1 iyax sngayan diyax, kiya ka knkana hmtur pnsliyan slhayan snhiyan, hmkun ka sanan mniq sapah pyasan, sanan mihah kahuy, kcka sanan tmapaq qsiya, sanan ppulah mi sanan qmita ccamac uri. Neyke Rikisi seyngkyo Kndusan niya Hassan Rouhani pa tama niya u Asatora Rouhani, sediq snbbari mnniq Iran Semnan Su na Bazaar, kiya mi bubu niya saya u wa mniq Semnan. Kngkawas 1969, Hassan Rouhani u tuhuy Naemeh Rouhan msturung, niqan 2 laqi dha snaw mi 2 ka laqi dha qridin. Laqi niya qbsuran snaw u wada mniq kngkawas 1992 idas 4 jisacu mhuqil, kiya mi wada sdhuwan Tehran Su Habung Beyhst Cahra. Uxay wana kari Persia, Hassan Rouhani pa mkla balay skari Ingkoku mi kari Arabia. Wada mangal Ingkoku Pyasan Tubeyhing Glasgow Calledonnian Horicu (PhD) Swey hakasey sweywey.

= Hassan Roohani = Mntocing hngkawas 1992 idas 8 jiyax 1 ka Hassan Roohani ga, empklaw ka hiya. Bokong klwaan Iran ta sayang o kiya ka Hassan Roohani, pnaah hngkawas 2013 idas 8 jiyax 4 pnrajing kmlawa klwaan. = Hassan Roohani = Hassan Roohani (kari Persia: حسن روحانی‎‎, kngkawas 1948 idas 11 diyax 12－), Iran seyji cya, waycyaw cya, mnngalan Iran sosi tanpan dayhyo. Poso kari srngaw dha ka kari Persia. Mniq kngkawas 2013 idas 6 diyax 14 na kngkawas 2013 kcka seyngkyo Soto cida mbiyax mangal Soto Iran, idas 8 diyax 3 ka psdhowan phiyo Soto. Kngkawas 2017 idas 5 diyax 20 wada mndongos lmotoc mangal Soto dongan. Kndosan Kngkawas 1948 idas 11 cida Hassan Roohani o mntoting Semnan Sng Sorkheh So, mnniq Semnan Singgakoying mi Qom Singgakoying moyas smlohay waya Islam, kiya ka brah tonox bokong Khomeni na mdho bay mpsnol niya, msmposal wada sqraq sapah kong. Kngkawas 1980 dhoq kngkawas 2000 ngalan gying Islam Gikay. Tobrah niya seyji Kngkawas 1989 dhoq kngkawas 2005, Hassan Roohani o ngalan Knbaraw Balay Qnlhangan Anjeyng Yingkay Miso, kngkawas 2000 prading ngalan Iran Seymong Kaygi cngweyn. Kngkawas 2003 dhoq kngkawas 2005 mniq Khatami ngalan Soto iyax cida, Hassan Roohani ka ngalan Iran sosi tanpan dayhyo, tohoy Ingkoko, France mi Doico snqori psangay Yo Nongswo wada smhdo kari. Soto Kngkawas 2013 idas 4 diyax 11 cida, Hassan Roohani pa pkla kari tomal seyngkyo Soto. Brah ini ooda seyngkyo knbeyhing han pa Knpriyox Pay taxa bay hosweynjn Aforey o wada kasi alix mpseyngkyo, Hassan Roohani o wada mspriyox meytaq Knpriyox Paya, hiya o wada mangal dnkohan Hatami mi Rahosangcyani. Mniq kcka 6 Soto hosweynjn o niqan 5 hiyi ka mkray pawso pay, Hassan Roohani Dmodol mndongos seyji mi keyjay cngce, tohoy txtaxa o ppwalok knmalo pnloban kana. Wada rmngaw ka hiya psli phiyo kingal 'Htngayan Knkla mi Sntangan' na seyho, tohoy qnlangan syakay phiyo mdho bay pnloban, so ini dayi pcaho mi mlih ka ka ndanan pcaho. Kngkawas 2013 idas 6 diyax 15, Iran Neycngpo pjla ndanan seyngkyo, knkana hyo seyngkyo o 36,704,156, wada mbiyax mangal 18,613,329 hyo ka Hassan Roohani, wada dmka dnkohan mi mndongos mangal borah sndhowan Soto, ana ini oda mnto2 seyngkyo, kiya mi poso balay pnsong hiya ka Mohammad Bagher Ghalibaf pa wana balay 6,077,292 hyo ka mnangal niya. Idas 8 diyax 3 cida, Iran tobaraw bokong Khamenei mdho bay pkla kari hniwan niya Soto ka Hassan Roohani, Hassan Roohani o mniq idas 8 diyax 4 mniq Gikay psdhowan phiyo, balay bay mdho phyowan to11 Soto Iran. Idas 9 diyax 27, Hassan Roohani o tohoy Amirika Soto Barac Obama moda mn1 pprngaw qnawal, niyi ka Soto Amirika mi Iran snpeyyah pstoq pnloban mntxan balay mpprngaw, pprngawan dha kari o rnrno qori ooda ho ori. Kngkawas 2017 idas 4 diyax 14, Hassan Roohani pkla kari mntxan tomal Soto seyngkyo dongan, mkmangal mntxan dongan. Idas 5 diyax 20, Iran Neycngpo ka moda pkla ndan seyngkyo, knkana hyo seyngkyo pa ya bay 40,000,000 hyo, Hassan Roohani o wada mangal ya bay 23,000,000 hyo, wada mangal hmrinas dmka dnkohan mi mndongos mbiyax mangal borah bnkowan Soto dongan, ana ini mnto2 meytaq hyo. Kngkawas 2019 idas 12 diyax 17, Hassan Roohani o mosa Malaysia tomal Kngkawas 2019 Koala Lompor Dodox Kay, tohoy Malaysia Sosyang Ton Dr Mahathir bin Mohamad mniq Bangonan Perdana Potra Boilding mtqita dqras. Ddha dha o ya bay mnoda pprngaw kari 45 pongkang. Kngkawas 2020 idas 7 diyax 18, Hassan Roohani mniq soto Tehran na neyge kaygi rmngaw, snpeyyah prro Narox Pono Brah Cyokoko Uhan (Narox COVID-19) psporoq dhoq saya, spowan o ya bay dhoq 2500 knbkiyan hiyi sediq Iran ka wada ron narox niyi, so moda snbeyhing mita knbeyhing bay narox preoro Narox Pono Brah Cyokoko Uhan (Narox COVID-19) niyi. Hassan Roohani o dmowi Iran Weysngpo na borah keyngkyo, rmngaw mniq mkpiya idas niyi pa, ya bay mosa 30 knbkiyan dhoq 3500 knbkiyan hiyi sediq ka moda prro Narox Pono Brah Cyokoko Uhan (Narox COVID-19) niyi, ya bay knhbrawan hiyi mosa mniq byoying o 'Nmk2 knhbrawan hiyi mnoda 150 diyax brah niya'. Seyho Tehran ori o wada pkla borah pnwaya kmtor o moda 1 iyax sngayan diyax, kiya ka knkana hmtor pnsliyan slhayan snhiyan, hmkon ka sanan mniq sapah pyasan, sanan mihah kahoy, kcka sanan tmapaq qsiya, sanan ppolah mi sanan qmita ccamac ori. Neyke Rikisi seyngkyo Kndosan niya Hassan Roohani pa tama niya o Asatora Roohani, sediq snbbari mnniq Iran Semnan So na Bazaar, kiya mi bobo niya saya o wa mniq Semnan. Kngkawas 1969, Hassan Roohani o tohoy Naemeh Roohan mstorong, niqan 2 laqi dha snaw mi 2 ka laqi dha qridin. Laqi niya qbsoran snaw o wada mniq kngkawas 1992 idas 4 jisaco mhoqil, kiya mi wada sdhowan Tehran So Habong Beyhst Cahra. Uxay wana kari Persia, Hassan Roohani pa mkla balay skari Ingkoko mi kari Arabia. Wada mangal Ingkoko Pyasan Tobeyhing Glasgow Calledonnian Horico (PhD) Swey hakasey sweywey.
